Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Repeals provisions exempting Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders from the residency requirement; repealer
Summary: Repeals provisions exempting Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders from the requirement to reside in Yates county.
LawCode: Rpld ยง3 subs 38 & 38-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivisions 38 and 38-a of section 3 of the public officers law, relating to exempting Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders from the requirement to reside in Yates county
